data.title: Christopher Eccleston
data.meta_description: Posts about Christopher Eccleston written by sparkymac
data.text:
Archaeology, arson, history and cultural preservation collide in a forgotten tale of the Trail of Tears. Don’t miss DIGADOHI: LANDS, CHEROKEE AND THE TRAIL OF TEARS – tonight at 8 on the North Carolina Channel.

The ALL CREATURES GREAT AND SMALL reboot is coming soon to MASTERPIECE and if you’re nervous about such a beloved classic TV program being remade, you are not alone. Maybe these set photographs from the new series will ease your mind.

Take a fresh look at the abdication crisis of 1936 through dramatized monologues by the two women at its heart – the Queen Mother and Wallis Simpson. Witness ROYAL WIVES AT WAR – Tuesday at 9pm on the Explorer Channel.

Christopher Eccleston may be best known to many for playing the Ninth Doctor on DOCTOR WHO but he left that series after only one season. Find out what he’s been up to since then.

Enjoy the world-renowned Vienna Philharmonic with guest conductor Gustavo Dudamel and famed pianist Yuja Wang. From Austria’s historic Schonbrunn Palace, GREAT PERFORMANCES presents a VIENNA PHILHARMONIC SUMMER NIGHT CONCERT – Friday night at 9 on UNC-TV.

Check out 10 Interesting Facts about the Cast of LARK RISE TO CANDLEFORD.

Explore the life and work of a playwright and activist who played a significant role in the civil rights movement. LaTanya Richardson Jackson narrates LORRAINE HANSBERRY on AMERICAN MASTERS – Sunday at 8pm on the North Carolina Channel.

And is Mr. Rogers worthy enough to lift Thor’s hammer? Yes, this is a discussion that’s happening.

Now, here are some wonderful folks who are not immune to the passing of time …

24 August

Stephen Fry (Jeeves And Wooster) is 63

Linda Henry (EastEnders) celebrates 57

Christopher Parker (EastEnders) marks 47

25 August

Joanne Whalley (Edge Of Darkness) is 59

Tom Hollander (Baptiste) has his 53rd

Claire Rushbrook (Home Fires) turns 49

Tracy Ann Oberman (EastEnders) is 54

26 August

Annette Badland (Bergerac) celebrates 70

Patrick Kennedy (Mrs. Wilson) turns 43

27 August

Suranne Jones (Scott & Bailey) is 42

Siobhan Redmond (Bulman) marks 61

Reece Shearsmith (The Widower) turns 51

Cheryl Fergison (EastEnders) has her 56th

Polly Adams (First Churchills) celebrates 81

28 August

Harold Snoad (Keeping Up Appearances) is 85

Lorcan Cranitch (Ballykissangel) marks 61

29 August

Lenny Henry (Chef!) has his 62nd

Charlotte Ritchie (Call The Midwife) is 31

30 August

Angel Coulby (The Tunnel) celebrates 40
